as.description: The element or component the Disclosure should render as.
as.description_zh: The element or component the Disclosure should render as.

defaultOpen.description: Whether or not the Disclosure component should be open by default.
defaultOpen.description_zh: Whether or not the Disclosure component should be open by default.

:open.description: Whether or not the disclosure is open.
:open.description_zh: Whether or not the disclosure is open.

:close.description:
Closes the disclosure and refocuses Disclosure.Button. Optionally pass
in a ref or HTMLElement to focus that element instead.
:close.description_zh:
Closes the disclosure and refocuses Disclosure.Button. Optionally pass
in a ref or HTMLElement to focus that element instead.
